name: Farm Swarm
description:
Mooing cows, braying horses, and... buzzzzing bugs?! 

Ow no! They're destroying your farm!

You, the last farm on earth, have to fight against these dangerous insects. Shoot your pumpkins or snipe your carrot to defeat big (scary) bosses. 

Instructions

  • Move with W, A, S, D.
  • Click to shoot
  • Scroll to switch your weapon.
